rukus.text: 74|1|He bastraacchadita! [1]
74|2|Uthuna, atahpara satarka karuna [1]
74|3|ara apanara rabera sresthatba ghosana karuna.
74|4|Ara apanara paricchada pabitra karuna [1]
74|5|ara sirka parihara kare caluna [1]
74|6|ara besi pa'oyara pratyasaya dana karabena na [1].
74|7|Ara apanara rabera jan'ye'i dhairya dharana karuna.
74|8|Atahpara yakhana singaya phumka deya habe [1]
74|9|sedina habe eka sankatera dina
74|10|ya kaphiradera jan'ya sahaja naya [1].
74|11|Chere dina amake o yake ami srsti karechi ekaki [1].
74|12|Ara ami take diyechi bipula dhana- sampada [1]
74|13|ebam nityasangi putragana [1]
74|14|ara take diyechi sbacchanda jibanera pracura upakarana
74|15|era para'o se kamana kare ye, ami take ara'o besi de'i [1]
74|16|kakhano naya, se to amadera nidarsanasamuhera birud'dhacari.
74|17|Acire'i ami take carara [1] sasti diye kasta-klanta karaba.
74|18|Se to cinta karala ebam sid'dhanta grahana karala.
74|19|Sutaram dhbansa hoka se! Kemana kare se e sid'dhanta grahana karala
74|20|tarapara'o dhbansa hoka se! Kemana kare se e sid'dhante upanita hala
74|21|tarapara se takala.
74|22|Tarapara se bhrakuncita karala o mukha bikrta karala.
74|23|Tarapara se pichana phirala ebam ahankara karala.
74|24|Atahpara se balala, ‘e to loka paramparaya prapta jadu bhinna ara kichu naya [1]
74|25|e to manusera'i katha.’
74|26|Acire'i ami take dagdha karaba ‘sakara’ e
74|27|ara apanake kise janabe ‘sakara’ ki
74|28|eta abasista rakhabe na ebam chere'o debe na [1].
74|29|Eta to sarirera camara puriye kalo kare debe
74|30|‘sakara’-era tattbabadhane rayeche unisajana prahari.

74|31|Ara amara to jahannamera prahari kebala pheresataderake'i karechi [1]; kaphiradera pariksasbarupa'i amara tadera e sankhya ullekha karechi yate kitabapraptadera drrha pratyaya janme, ara yara imana eneche tadera imana bere yaya. Ara kitabapraptara o muminara sandeha posana na kare. Ara yena era phale yadera antare byadhi ache tara o kaphirara bale, allah e (sankhyara) upama [2] (ullekha kara) dbara ki iccha karechena?’ Ebhabe allah yake icche pathabhrasta karena ebam yake icche hedayata karena. Ara apanara rabera bahini samparke tini chara ke'u jane na. Ara jahannamera e barnana to manusera jan'ya eka upadesa matra.
